WRITING.TITLE: My mother in law bought a talking parrot, but returned it a week later.
WRITING.TEXT:
"This parrot hasn't spoke a single word." She complained.
"I haven't had a fucking chance to!" Replied the parrot.

Interviewer: Do you have any questions for me?
Me: No.
No.
Your incorrect spelling of the word 'queue' is *really* bugging me.
I really want to believe you, but I don't think I can take another bamboozling.
I'm so sick of the hobos, always begging for change. I don't like how I gotta work, and they just sit around and get paid.
My girlfriend does that, it drives me crazy. She now just buys her own toothpaste to avoid the look of disdain I was giving her every morning.
Bacon is the worst for this. After numerous failures I still always try, hoping it will work *this* time. But no, gotta stab the fucking pack as usual.
Thank "U", Barbara.
Dear God, you've just given me an aneurysm.
I'm sure it was intentional, but "come's" is really bugging me...
I was partial to the strawberry flavoured one. I was talking to my friend about this the other day actually, and I don't think I've seen anywhere that still sells it.

You said yourself, your daughter loves it. It shouldn't matter what colour the doll is. All that has happened is a grandmother gave her granddaughter a gift that she likes. Please don't read too much into it.
Pfft.. Kids today. They shouldn't be allowed to drink decent alcohol, they should do what the rest of us did and burn their oesophagus' on MD 20/20 before drinking the good stuff.
He changed it to 'pensioners' though... We should upvote it for the creativity alone. /s

I left the bar after a few too many drinks last night, and I'm sure I saw a baby ghost fly past me.
Although, in hindsight, it could have just been a handkerchief.
Please tell me I didn't just spend 5 minutes looking at that to find "TITS"?
Hey me too! We must have the same birthday!

WRITING.TITLE: Taking your lunch out of the office microwave when it's still quite cold, because there's a queue forming behind you.

WRITING.TEXT: Fucking Carole!
I once said "well, it's better than it was." Thinking I was making a joke, the barber however thought I wasn't happy and looked genuinely upset. I found a new barber after that.
I like to throw in the occasional "mm-hmm brilliant" and the odd head nod too.
Don't forget apologising after being apologised to.
I've always wondered if it's the same Jack as other literary Jacks, like "Jack the lad" and "Jack Sprat".

Dont think
Ok.
[You just copied and pasted, didn't you?] (https://www.quora.com/What-is-your-opinion-on-Disney)
I'd just be grateful that your doctor is seeing patients this late on a Sunday.

Bra is a shortened version of the word "brassiere," which has its origin as a Norman word for a child's undershirt. Hence singular.
Panties are small pants. "Pants" are a shortened version of "pantaloons." Pantaloons take their name from the Commedia dell'arte character Pantaloon who in turn gets his name from the Italian martyr "Pantaleon" (Pan = all, Leon = lion) who survived seven execution attempts by the Roman authorities.
Edit: just seen which sub this was posted in, I'm still leaving my original comment up as I wouldn't class this as a *joke*.
A fork, of course! The real LPT is always in the comments.
I tried that thinking it would be healthier, but I couldn't get them back out.
Hah! How dumb. Everyone knows you just microwave them.
We can't all be Power Rangers, you douche.

WRITING.TITLE: I go to a muscular dystrophy support group.
WRITING.TEXT: We meet weakly.
Finally, something I can relate to. Updoot to you, sir.
Death by snu snu.
Your symbol sounds like it's broke.
Damn you and your well timed bowel movements.
My 3 year old asks this constantly. I feel like if I answered them all we'd eventually find the meaning of life.
Because I don't want to hear my colleagues tell me how cold it is outside, so I'm looking at my phone avoiding social situations.
/r/antijokes
How many drunkard ant perverts do you know?
Because you're 12?
*I'm gonna knock... on wood*

WRITING.TITLE: Old lady queue jumped me at the bus stop, proceeded to tut and violently stare at the back of her head, ended with an audible sigh when her bus pass didn't work.
WRITING.TEXT: Bet she thinks twice about queue jumping now.

WRITING.TITLE: A wife is yelling at her husband
WRITING.TEXT:
"Get out of the house! I hate you, I want a divorce! Get out!"
As he walks out the door she screams: "I hope you die a slow and painful death!"
The guy says: "So hang on a minute, now you want me to stay?"
Yeah, frigid air = Frigidaire.
I'm not racist because I know the difference between white and wrong.
Fridge comes from Frigidaire, which was a make of refrigerator.
I once put my d in the refrigerator... Was, surprisingly, enjoyable.
Byker metro station by any chance?

WRITING.TITLE: My son is an ungrateful little shit!
WRITING.TEXT: I bought him a trampoline for Christmas, but he'd rather sit in his wheelchair and cry.
I know the feeling. I feel like most of these stores should change their name to "Around a Pound" to avoid confusion.

WRITING.TITLE: I just read a list of "100 Things To Do Before You Die".
WRITING.TEXT: I was pretty surprised that "yell for help" wasn't one of them.
Thanks man, was using for 9 years.
Quit heroin cold turkey and quit smoking.

WRITING.TITLE: 2016 strikes again. The inventor of the inappropriate innuendo has died.
WRITING.TEXT: His family are taking it really hard.
/r/trees is pretty good for that.

WRITING.TITLE: For sale: Thick layer of dust
WRITING.TEXT: As seen on TV.
22 days ago. Was gonna make it my New Years resolution, but thought fuck it. If I'm going to quit I'm gonna quit now.
When I was getting myself off heroin cold turkey. Ask any ex addict, you *never* trust a fart when going through withdrawal symptoms.
Hate it when that happens when you're washing your cereal spoon, and you get soaked right before you have to leave for work.
Joe Pesci plays Harry.

WRITING.TITLE: Getting my dad some strong aftershave and a cigarette lighter for Christmas.
WRITING.TEXT: Can't wait to see his face light up.
Granted, Brian is sometimes a little slow, but idiot is a bit harsh.

WRITING.TITLE: My dwarf girlfriend went to work this morning upset with me.
WRITING.TEXT:
I've been taking the piss out of her size. So I'm going all out to make it up to her tonight.
I've got a good bottle of wine in and bought her the latest dvd box set of her favourite programme. When she gets in from work I'm going to order her favourite takeaway, then go upstairs and run her a nice hot sink.
Nazi... I'm as disappointed as you. By the way, Nazi isn't a letter! No wonder you got me confused OP!
If I wanted to split hairs, I would have became a Metrologist.
Wait, so you don't currently own an HD TV? Where do you live, Syria?
All joking aside... They're some tasty biscuits.
When?
*Cunt stubble

*than
If you're gonna tell a shitty joke, at least tell it properly.
Why?
Bet they're *stoked*.
Hitler's last words?
Wow, thanks. I hope to one day emulate the wit and astuteness you've just shown in that comment.
Recycling jokes from the stone age was bad enough, but, and correct me if I'm wrong, isn't it supposed to be Mary not Marry?
Apparently that's how the real jokes are made.
Who's there

Whose There
I stopped reading after that.

I've started calling my Grandad Spiderman.
He doesn't have any superpowers, he just can't get out of the bath.

WRITING.TITLE: Hoping to get a 4k tv after Christmas.
WRITING.TEXT: Making my new years resolution 3840 x 2160.
